featured.text: Their consensus, however, is that unless the injury involves something as serious as a broken bone or a ripped muscle, moderate exercise can actually speed healing.

definition.zh_def: 撕裂或破壞的行為，通常指物體的損壞或死亡。
definition.en_def: To tear or damage something, often referring to the destruction of an object or the death of a person.
definition.example: He felt a deep sadness when he heard that his favorite band had decided to rip apart.
